data.name: Galactic Gym: Fitness Center Management
data.detailed_description:
It’s gym management… in SPAAAACE! Galactic Gym gives you all the tools you need to manage the galaxy’s greatest gym. Choose exercise equipment, manage your employees, and build up the gym of your dreams as you reach out to customers from across the galaxy!

Take charge of a gym in a galaxy-wide setting


As natural disasters threaten the Earth, humanity ventures out into the galaxy. In these new, unfamiliar environments, exercise and fitness are more important than ever. This situation calls for one thing: a galactic gym!

Start with a small gym and make it into something great by buying exercise machines and equipment, hiring employees, and expanding it into the gym of your dreams.

Manage your expenses carefully as you build up your new gym into one that can cater to a wide variety of intergalactic tastes. Branch out into numerous bodybuilding disciplines, from calisthenics to yoga, and make sure your customers get the best experience possible.

Unexpected knowledge and exciting surprises are waiting for you out there in this brave new galaxy. Learn about various exercise disciplines in the gym, then check out different environments available now that you’re no longer bound by the rules of Earth. Each new level will provide something new to discover.

Special events will occur as your gym grows, so bring in more customers and wait to see what each new development brings!

data.short_description: Can you run the galaxy’s greatest gym? Step into the shoes of a gym manager and fulfill the exercise dreams of your intergalactic customers! With equipment for numerous disciplines, varied exercise environments, and many employees to hire, you can create the best gym on this side of the Milky Way!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Japanese*, Korean*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*, Traditional Chinese*, Turkish*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Dual or AMD Equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: HD Intel Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
